Nodes for arc-node topology.

sc_node.Rd

Nodes are the vertices in the graph that are shared by "arcs".

sc_node(x, ...)

# S3 method for SC
sc_node(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
sc_node(x, ...)

# S3 method for PATH
sc_node(x, ...)

# S3 method for ARC
sc_node(x, ...)

Arguments

x

input object
...

arguments for methods

Examples

sc <- SC(routes)
library(dplyr)
plot(sc)
sc_node(sc) %>% inner_join(sc$vertex) %>% select(x_, y_) %>% points()
#> Joining, by = "vertex_"
